## ModelBooter.load() method

Uses super method to get a list of Artifact classes. Boot each file by creating a DataSourceConstructor and binding it to the application class.

**Signature:**

```typescript
load(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
